other_tests.findings: ERCP showed mildly dilated pancreatic duct, dilated intrahepatics, dilated CBD, filling defect suggestive of stone, and CBD stricture with upstream dilation.
Initial test yielded an AM cortisol of 9.2 with ACTH 6, subsequent test yielded a high AM cortisol of 13.0 and ACTH 7.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A continued suppression test yielded AM cortisol of 13.1 with ACTH 6.

other_tests.findings: Initially mild elevation of 24 hour urine free cortisols.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent 24 hour urine free cortisols have been normal.

other_tests.findings: ECG showed right bundle branch block (RBBB).
Multiple hypoechoic foci noted in the liver, with the dominant focus unchanged to slightly decreased in size (from 3.1 x 1.7 x 2.9 cm to 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.3 cm).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Cluster of peripheral hypodense lesions unchanged since the prior study.
